ygData.subject: Re: Lets find Bidl Frugin
ygData.msgSnippet: This is news to me.  Well, I will have to keep camping it when I get back on the game Sunday. Well, can you tell me where Bidl spawns and how to get the other
ygData.messageBody:
This is news to me. Well, I will have to keep camping it when I get back
on the game Sunday.
Well, can you tell me where Bidl spawns and how to get the other two lenses
from the observatories?

At 11:11 AM 07/23/1999 -0400, you wrote:
>From: AOLTechDaZ@...
>
>All the lenses are for the observer Staff. For sure. That is not an
>issue.
> I have seen people complete this quest in akanon so it can be done.
> There is a whole guild on the Povar server Named the Harmonium that have
>these staffs from accomplishing the four lenses quest. granted You can
>also get the staff off the borxx evil eye by obtaining his lense. But I
>have seen high level characters in the mino caves in steam font get the lense
>from the slave in there. They do it regularly to keep their lower level
>guildies equipped.
>
